snippet: Mark Sanford, whose career and marriage crumbled as he pursued a relationship with an Argentine woman, said he would run for a House seat that opened up last month.
abstract: Mark Sanford, former South Carolina governor whose career and marriage crumbled over affair with an Argentine woman, says he will run for state's vacant House seat.
lead_paragraph: Mark Sanford, whose career and marriage crumbled as he pursued a relationship with an Argentine woman, said he would run for a House seat that opened up last month.

headline.seo: Mark Sanford, Ex-Governor of South Carolina, to Run for Congress
headline.main: Ex-Governor, Disgraced in Scandal, Eyes Congress
headline.print_headline: Ex-Governor, Disgraced In Scandal, Eyes Congress
